divs: Sighting Details On September 25, 1970, in the town of Jessup, Pa.,I was returning home from a high school football game, when I sighted adisk-shaped, glowing, silver U.F.O. 1000 feet in length. Turret, windows, ontop, three glowing spheres, central flat disk, underneath. After event, I wasvisited by the men-in-black.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Jessup
There were no other sightings in Jessup on or around September 25th 1970
